channel.title: Systems Administration on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in Systems Administration on Today I Learned

item.description: You can use journalctl -u ${service_name}.service --since ${time:-today} to view the logs of a systemd service: https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-use-journalctl-to-view-and-manipulate-systemd-logs
